import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Button,InputGroup} from 'react-bootstrap' import Axios from 'axios' export default class EditProject extends Component { state={ delete:false, } delete=()=>{ Axios.delete('http://localhost:5000/add/project/'+this.props.data._id) .then(data=>{ alert('this project is deleted') window.location.reload() }) .catch(err=>console.log(err) ) } render() { return (

) } }
